main.description: Kanbee is a handy collaboration tool that allows you to organize projects in the form of boards. With Kanbee, you can quickly assess the current status of work, see who is doing what, and what stage the process is at.
main.author: author

help.description: A small memo for comfortable work in Kanbee
help.adminOnly: Only works for the project creator

renameColumn.title: Renaming a column
renameColumn.description: When you click on the column name, a stroke for editing will appear, saving will be done after you change the focus to something else.

description.1: , You need to delete the title completely and additionally click on the
description.2: Be careful, because when you delete a column, all the tasks that were in it will be irretrievably deleted.
